Computer graphics

I really like computer graphics. I think that it’s one of the most interesting fields of programming. The things that people make can be absolutely gorgeous, and graphics as a field sits at an interesting intersection of computer science, geometry, and design.

Lately, I’ve been really inspired by a lot of graphics artists. Some people do a lot with patterns in 2D animations, like @beesandbombs and @satoshi_aizawa on Twitter. There’s also been a lot of interesting work lately from Sebastian Lague on YouTube. I’m hoping that

Here, I’ll keep track of my projects in computer graphics, as well as anything that stands out to me on the Internet that I really want to take note of.
